plot: In search of a potential Utopian lover she met on the Internet, Selene, a Mexican woman, travels to Sarajevo. Pursuit of this love will reveal to her the true meaning of migration, the migration of the soul.
title: Escarabajo
plot_es: In search of a potential Utopian lover she met on the Internet, Selene, a Mexican woman, travels to Sarajevo. Pursuit of this love will reveal to her the true meaning of migration, the migration of the soul.
plot_en: In search of a potential Utopian lover she met on the Internet, Selene, a Mexican woman, travels to Sarajevo. Pursuit of this love will reveal to her the true meaning of migration, the migration of the soul.
